meanings.definition: To reach the highest point of a mountain.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, we summited the hill behind our house.
meanings.sent2: The climbers finally summited the peak after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel summited the tree with impressive speed.
meanings.sent4: She summited her fears and conquered the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The eagle gracefully summited the sky, soaring above all.

meanings.definition: To reach the highest level or point.
meanings.sent1: The team summited their performance with a flawless routine.
meanings.sent2: After years of hard work, he summited his career goals.
meanings.sent3: The cake summited in the oven, surprising everyone with its height.
meanings.sent4: Her voice summited the notes, filling the room with music.
meanings.sent5: The rocket summited into space, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
